DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether additional induction chemotherapy ( IC ) concurrent chemoradiotherapy ( CCRT ) able improve overall survival ( OS ) disease-free survival ( DFS ) , clarify stage-specified chemoradiotherapy regimens benefit locoregionally advanced NPC .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Investigation Impacts Prognosis Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Data patient firstly diagnose NPC Jan 1st , 1998 Jun 1st , 2013 download Department Medical Information , Sun Yat-Sen University Cancer Center . Patients exclude stage I II disease , complete medical record , receive treatment previously , without concurrent chemoradiotherapy . Follow-up data update October 1st , 2015.The propensity score-matching ( PSM ) method adopt balance observe covariates group . Propensity score reflect conditional probability intend uniform patient receive CCRT IC+CCRT base baseline characteristic . Matching perform base nearest-neighbor matching , compare CCRT IC+CCRT patient match within respective risk group .
